name: stubshot
description: CLI-first tool for deterministic local placeholder images

scripts.size:audit: rm -rf /tmp/stubshot-size && mkdir -p /tmp/stubshot-size && pnpm -C packages/core pack --pack-destination /tmp/stubshot-size && pnpm -C packages/provider-local pack --pack-destination /tmp/stubshot-size && pnpm -C packages/provider-openai pack --pack-destination /tmp/stubshot-size && pnpm -C packages/cli pack --pack-destination /tmp/stubshot-size && du -h /tmp/stubshot-size/*.tgz
